Sky from Friday Night Funkin' joins the crewmates in this Imposter mod video! Join Player, Captain, Mr. Cheese and the rest of your Among Us Logic favorites as they survive against the obsessed singer!

Don't forget to like, comment, subscribe and share to show your support for this channel!
